fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune destruction of pancreatic beta cells.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: No specific findings; may have weight loss.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular blood glucose monitoring, endocrinologist follow-up
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Often asymptomatic, may have polyuria, polydipsia.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Insulin resistance and relative insulin deficiency.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Overweight/obesity, acanthosis nigricans in some cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Lifestyle modification, oral hypoglycemics, insulin if necessary
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Dietary management, physical activity, regular monitoring
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fatigue, weight gain, cold intolerance, constipation.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular TSH monitoring, adjust dose as necessary
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Weight loss, heat intolerance, palpitations, anxiety.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fatigue, muscle weakness, weight loss, hyperpigmentation.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Hyperpigmentation, especially in sun-exposed areas, mucous membranes.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Secondary adrenal insufficiency, chronic fatigue syndrome
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Stress dose steroids during illness, medical alert bracelet
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Ovarian cysts on ultrasound, clinical or biochemical signs of hyperandrogenism.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Weight management, monitor for metabolic syndrome
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Weight gain, particularly in the trunk, moon face, purple striae.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Central obesity, facial rounding, skin changes.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Reduce corticosteroid use, surgery for tumours
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Enlarged hands and feet, facial feature changes, joint pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Elevated growth hormone and IGF-1 levels.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Jaw protrusion, increased hand and foot size, coarse facial features.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgery, somatostatin analogs, growth hormone receptor antagonists
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of hormone levels, manage comorbidities
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antithyroid drugs, radioactive iodine therapy, surgery
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Eye care for ophthalmopathy, calcium and vitamin D
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Levothyroxine to normalise thyroid hormone levels
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular TSH level monitoring, adjust levothyroxine dose as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Weight gain, particularly in the trunk, moon face, purple striae.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Central obesity, facial rounding, skin changes.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Reduce corticosteroid use, surgery for tumours
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Enlarged hands and feet, facial feature changes, joint pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Elevated growth hormone and IGF-1 levels.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Jaw protrusion, increased hand and foot size, coarse facial features.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgery, somatostatin analogs, growth hormone receptor antagonists
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of hormone levels, manage comorbidities
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Bone pain, fractures with minimal trauma.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Calcium and vitamin D supplements, bisphosphonates
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular bone density scans, fall prevention measures
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Bone pain, kidney stones, fatigue, depression.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Overactivity of one or more parathyroid glands.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: High calcium levels in the blood.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible bone tenderness, abdominal pain due to stones.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgical removal of affected gland(s), medication for symptom management
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: High blood pressure, palpitations, headache, sweating.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May have no specific findings; diagnosis often confirmed by urine or blood test.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgical removal of the tumour, alpha and beta blockers pre-operatively
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring for recurrence, genetic testing in familial cases
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to radiation, family history of thyroid cancer.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Palpable thyroid nodule, possibly with cervical lymphadenopathy.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgical removal, radioactive iodine, thyroid hormone therapy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Central obesity, high blood pressure, insulin resistance.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Lifestyle changes, medication for hypertension, diabetes
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Hypertension, muscle weakness, headache, and episodes of paralysis.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can be caused by an adrenal adenoma.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Excess aldosterone production leading to sodium retention and potassium loss.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal physical examination, possibly hypokalaemia on lab tests.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgical removal of adenoma or aldosterone antagonists for management
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor blood pressure and serum potassium levels
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Short stature in children, poor bone density, increased body fat.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Genetic, idiopathic, or secondary to pituitary damage.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Short stature compared to peers, delayed growth milestones.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of growth and development, adjust therapy as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Persistent hypertension, muscle cramps, and fatigue.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can result from adrenal hyperplasia or an aldosterone-producing adenoma.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Elevated aldosterone levels with low plasma renin activity.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May present with normal physical findings, hypokalaemia on blood tests.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Aldosterone antagonists, surgical intervention if indicated
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Varied symptoms depending on affected glands: ulcers, calcium imbalances, pituitary tumours.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Genetic disorder affecting multiple endocrine glands.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Tumours in parathyroid, pancreatic, and pituitary glands.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Signs related to hormone overproduction: hypercalcaemia, peptic ulcers.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgical removal of tumours, management of hormone levels
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular screening for affected glands, genetic testing for family members
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Asymptomatic, may notice swelling in neck or difficulty swallowing.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Most are benign; a small percentage can be cancerous.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Palpable nodules in the thyroid gland.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Nodule palpation on thyroid exam, further characterised by ultrasound.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Fine-needle aspiration biopsy for suspicious nodules
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Monitoring, thyroid hormone suppression therapy, or surgery for large or malignant nodules
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular ultrasound monitoring, thyroid function tests
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Rare, usually benign tumour of the pancreas that produces insulin.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Episodes of hypoglycaemia, especially fasting or exertional.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal examination; symptoms occur during hypoglycaemic episodes.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Non-islet cell tumour hypoglycaemia, sulfonylurea misuse
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitoring blood glucose levels, avoid fasting
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: High calcium levels, bone pain, kidney stones, abdominal pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Rare cancer of the parathyroid gland.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Significantly elevated calcium and parathyroid hormone (PTH) levels.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible palpable neck mass, signs of hypercalcaemia.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Manage hypercalcaemia pre- and post-operatively, monitor for recurrence
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular calcium and PTH level checks
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Early signs of puberty, rapid growth in childhood but shorter adult height, ambiguous genitalia in newborns.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Genetic disorder affecting steroid hormone production.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Varies with form of CAH; may include signs of androgen excess.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Adjustment of hormone therapy based on growth, development, and stress
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Insufficient sunlight exposure, poor dietary intake.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May be asymptomatic; signs of bone softening or weakness.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Sun exposure, dietary sources of vitamin D, supplementation as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fatigue, abdominal pain, weight loss, low blood pressure.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune, tuberculosis, or secondary to steroid withdrawal.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Deficiency in cortisol, and possibly aldosterone.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Requires glucocorticoid and possibly mineralocorticoid replacement
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of electrolytes, cortisol levels
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Most common in older adults, genetic factors may play a role.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Enlarged and deformed bones on physical examination.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of bone health, physical therapy as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can be caused by pituitary tumours, medications, or hypothyroidism.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible evidence of pituitary mass on MRI.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Dopamine agonists, treatment of underlying disease
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor prolactin levels, MRI follow-up for pituitary tumours
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Muscle weakness, bone pain, difficulty walking.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Vitamin D deficiency, certain medications, or disorders affecting Vitamin D metabolism.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Softening of the bones due to defective bone mineralization.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Requires Vitamin D and calcium supplementation
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Vitamin D and calcium supplements, exposure to sunlight
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of Vitamin D levels and bone density
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Neck pain, fatigue, variable thyroid function.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can follow viral infection (subacute) or be autoimmune (Hashimoto or postpartum).
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Pain management, thyroid hormone replacement if needed
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular thyroid function tests, symptom management
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Polyuria, polydipsia, nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, altered mental state.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Typically in type 1 diabetes, can be triggered by infection or stress.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Dehydration, rapid breathing, fruity odour of breath.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: IV fluids, insulin therapy, electrolyte replacement
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Intensive care monitoring, education on diabetes management
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Bone pain, kidney stones, abdominal pain, depression.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Elevated calcium and parathyroid hormone levels.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible neck mass, signs of hypercalcaemia.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgical intervention, monitoring of calcium and bone density
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up with endocrinology, monitoring of serum calcium levels
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Complication of chronic kidney disease leading to elevated PTH levels.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Common in patients with chronic kidney failure.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Response to low calcium levels and vitamin D deficiency.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: No specific physical findings; symptoms related to underlying kidney disease.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Vitamin D analogs, phosphate binders, possibly surgery
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Management of underlying renal disease, regular monitoring of PTH and calcium
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: May be related to hormonal imbalances, medication use, or underlying health disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Observation, medication review, surgery for persistent cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Irregular menstrual cycles, galactorrhea, infertility in women; erectile dysfunction in men.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible visual field defects if tumour is large.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor prolactin levels, MRI for tumour growth
fields.label: Care Plan
